content:
Web-public stream created by Joe Moeller. Description:

No description.

Btw, there's already a stream called "ACT 2023" full of information about this conference:

https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/229141-general.3A-events/topic/ACT.202023/near/375944330
It probably makes sense to merge that with this.
I'm sharing a bunch of info here, and we'll send it all in an email later today.
I just sent an email to everyone registered for in-person participation.
You can let me know if you have any questions here or through email.
Will registered online participants receive a zoom link tomorrow? Will all the talks be streamed live via zoom?

Jorge Soto-Andrade said:

Will registered online participants receive a zoom link tomorrow? Will all the talks be streamed live via zoom?

I am registered virtually and received an email on 27 July with zoom links and passwords. Maybe it went to spam?
